name: Betty Falcon's Pro Surfer 1
description:
Betty Falcon's Pro Surfer 1

Surf as far as possible and jump over obstacles to win the surfing contest! Jumping will earn you points but BEWARE! Betty speeds up a little up each time she successfully lands a jump. Will you help her win the surfing contest?

Controls

A - Move upwards
D - Move downwards
Space Bar - Jump

Credits Programming

Tom Semeijn
Silvijn de Vries

Art

Elizaveta Makhova
Rayne Blair

Design

Bram Simonis
Marloes de Graaf
Renato Civadelić

Assets Music

Blue Wave Theory - Skyhawk Beach

Voice

Cici Fyre
